name: Lost Gift
description:
The gift need to find his house before the end of the night !  Talk with the creatures to find your way and jump all around the village.

******

Commands : 

Move : Click on the ground 

Lock / Unlock Camera Rotation : Shift

Pass to the next sentence : Space 

******

This is an Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam Game : https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-holiday-2018-game-jam/rate/346508

Have a good game !
